page.title: 16Services In Notgrove
page.content: Notgrove has no shop, but mobile shops visit the village. The Milkman delivers 3 times a week, Monday, Wednesday and Friday, bringing bread as well as dairy produce. A van from Hathaways of Cold Aston brings daily and weekly papers together with groceries, sweets, cigarettes and Greeting cards. Sunday papers are delivered to 1 cottage from Bourton and distributed by the children. The Northleach Butcher delivers on Tuesdays and Fridays. The Post Office opens Mornings and only sells Postal Orders and Stamps. There is a daily delivery and collection of Mail operated from Bourton. Refuse is collected once a week. The road sweeper visits regularly and the country lanes are adequately maintained. The Coalman delivers on a regular basis.
